Welcome to execovid_dashboard’s documentation!¶

This module controls the UI of my dashboard

covid_dashboard_pkg.app.display_covid_update()¶

refreshes the covid_data variable contained in render_template

covid_dashboard_pkg.app.display_news_update()¶

refreshes the news variable contained in render_template

covid_dashboard_pkg.app.index()¶

Controls the main page of my dashboard, updating info on it.

covid_dashboard_pkg.app.schedule_covid_updates(update_interval: int, update_name: str)¶

Schedules updates for the COV19 API. :param update_interval: interval between a process being scheduled and ran. :param update_name: Declares whether event is being repeated or not.

covid_dashboard_pkg.app.schedule_news_updates(update_interval: int, update_name: str)¶

Controls the interval at which the news on the dashboard is refreshed

This module retrieves and formats Covid data

covid_dashboard_pkg.covid_data_handler.covid_API_request(location: str = 'Exeter', location_type: str = 'ltla') → <module 'json' from 'C:\\Users\\Adam\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python310\\lib\\json\\__init__.py'>¶

Uses the COV19 API to return Covid data in JSON format. :param location: location of COVID data. :param ltla: location type (national, ltla for local etc.)

covid_dashboard_pkg.covid_data_handler.parse_csv_data(csv_filename: str) → list¶

Converts each line of a CSV file into an array.

covid_dashboard_pkg.covid_data_handler.process_covid_csv_data(covid_csv_data: list) → tuple¶

Returns key COVID stats from the CSV module produced by the COV19 API

covid_dashboard_pkg.covid_data_handler.process_covid_json_data() → dict¶

Returns live formatted covid statistics to be utilized by the dashboard.

This module deals with extracting information from the config file.

covid_dashboard_pkg.config_handler.get_API_key()¶

Fetches the API key from the config.json

covid_dashboard_pkg.config_handler.get_location()¶

Fetches the local location to be used in covid_data_handler.

covid_dashboard_pkg.config_handler.get_picture()¶

Fetches the name of the picture from config.json

This module gathers COVID news articles and formats it to be used by the Flask Dashboard.

covid_dashboard_pkg.covid_news_handling.news_API_request(covid_terms: str = 'Covid&COVID-19&coronavirus&') → <module 'json' from 'C:\\Users\\Adam\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python310\\lib\\json\\__init__.py'>¶

Returns a JSON containing articles with topics specified in covid_terms :param covid_terms: string containing article topics in the format <topic>&<topic>&…

covid_dashboard_pkg.covid_news_handling.update_news() → dict¶

Formats the JSON produced by news_API_request to be used by the dashboard

This module tests the functions which make up my covid application.
